Bash(gh pr create --title "Improve AI agent and event card UI" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- AI agent now asks clarifying questions when event info is incomplete (time, location, duration)
- Added conversation history for event confirmation/rejection results
- Improved event card UI with custom DatePicker and TimePicker components
- Duration selector now supports hours + minutes instead of minutes only
- Added collapsible sidebar toggle to CalendarView

## Test plan
- [ ] Test AI agent with vague time expressions (e.g., "ë‚´ì¼ ì €ë…ì•½ì†") - should ask for clarification
- [ ] Test AI agent with precise time (e.g., "ë‚´ì¼ ì˜¤í›„ 3ì‹œ ë¯¸íŒ…") - should create event directly
- [ ] Test event confirmation/rejection - result message should appear in conversation history
- [ ] Test DatePicker and TimePicker in event card editing
- [ ] Test duration hours+minutes selector
- [ ] Test CalendarView sidebar toggle button
